description: ① Unfortunately ② Bad timing. "Tai qiao le" means "Good timing" or "Coincidence".

examples.chinese: 太不巧了,这周他都不在上海
examples.translation: Unfortunately, he is not in Shanghai all this week

examples.chinese: 实在太不巧了,我明天上午有课
examples.translation: Really bad timing, I have class tomorrow morning

examples.chinese: 认识的时间太不巧了,当时他已经有女朋友了
examples.translation: Met at the wrong time, he already had a girlfriend then
